name: Lego Crystal Rush; 2 Levels
description:
Lego Crystal Rush: Two Levels

PC Game

Rating: E

Ages 6+

Overview: Get a feel for the collection of Crystals in level one to move onto the more challenging level 2.

Instructions: Collect all the crystals & a crab while dodging canons and lasers and avoiding exploding animals.

Use the arrows to move or A,S,W,D, the space bar to jump and your mouse or finger pad to adjust the view.

Game Design Team

Bennett Potter, Game Designer
